days.label: Wednesday
days.title: Tempo Run
options: Boost your speed endurance and get comfortable with faster paces 🏃‍♀️

days.label: Thursday
days.title: Rest Day
days.description: Rest. It's part of the plan 🛋️

days.label: Friday
days.title: Intervals
days.description: Run 5 intervals of 0.6 km at 5:45 min/km pace. Each interval is followed by 1:30 min recovery at 7:00 min/km pace
options: Total distance: 4.1 km
Improve your speed and running economy 🚀

days.label: Saturday
days.title: Long Run
options: Focus on a steady pace and enjoy the run ✨
Long Run Pace: 7:30 min/km.
Focus on slow, steady effort to build time on feet.
Avoid pushing pace; keep it relaxed and easy.
Tip: Use long runs to refine gear, nutrition, and hydration strategies for race day.
